Note: Signed "W.S. Byhtyolos" (?) "Poster No.35" appears on the bottom left of the poster. "(4415) Wt.32162/2171 150,000 9/17 H.W.&V.,Ld. (E.1795)" appears on the bottom right of the poster. Orientation: Vertical.
Description: Text says to save for your childrens education you should buy war savings certificates. Illustration shows a father showing his children the war savings certificates he had bought.
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I
Local Rights Statement: This material is made available for private study, scholarship, and research use. For access to the original or a high resolution reproduction, contact: Temple University Libraries, Special Collections Research Center, scrc@temple.edu, 215-204-8257.

Title: Are you saving for the children?
